body.name: Graco Solano 4-in-1 Convertible Crib with Drawer Combo (White) – GREENGUARD Gold Certified, Includes Full-Size Nursery Storage Drawer, Converts to Toddler Bed and Full-Size Bed
body.stockDetail: Only 11 left in stock (more on the way).
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 19 hrs 9 mins
features: 4-IN-1 CONVERTIBLE CRIB WITH DRAWER: Converts from baby crib (mattress sold separately) to toddler bed (compatible with 1 or 2 toddler guardrails, each sold separately), daybed, and full-size bed with headboard & optional footboard (compatible full-size conversion kit sold separately)
FULL-SIZE STORAGE DRAWER: Crib includes full-size drawer with 2 compartments, allowing you to conveniently store and organize your nursery items and essentials

ADAPTS TO YOUR GROWING BABY: Adjustable mattress support base with 3 different height options; Designed to fit any standard full-size crib & toddler mattress; This baby crib may be used until your child can easily climb out or is taller than 35in (89cm)

GREENGUARD GOLD CERTIFIED, JPMA CERTIFIED: GREENGUARD Gold Certified products are screened for more than 10,000 chemicals and VOCs known to pollute indoor air; Expert tested to meet or exceed all applicable category voluntary and mandatory safety standards
QUALITY CRAFTSMANSHIP: Crafted with pine wood, engineered wood, and wood composites; Packaging tested to reduce the risk of incidental damage that could occur during shipment
body.description: The Graco Solano 4-in-1 Convertible Crib with Drawer combines classic looks with the added convenience of a space-saving storage drawer, allowing you to conveniently store and organize your most important nursery essentials. Designed to adapt to your growing baby, the Graco Solano is equipped with a 3-position adjustable mattress support base, and can convert into a daybed, toddler bed, and full-size bed. JPMA certified and compliant with all applicable ASTM International and CPSC safety standards, the Graco Solano 4-in-1 Convertible Crib with Drawer is made of high-quality pine wood and composites, is available in multiple baby-safe, non-toxic finishes, and is backed by a 1-year limited manufacturer's warranty. To complete your Graco crib, consider the Graco Deluxe Foam Crib & Toddler Bed Mattress - awarded the 2020 Women's Choice Award for 9 out of 10 Customer Recommended Crib & Toddler Mattress.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Graco Solano 4-in-1 Convertible Crib with Drawer

Crib This crib is designed to accommodate your growing child. It features a three-positioned adjustable mattress support base. Set the mattress at the middle or highest height for your new born baby. Toddler Bed With or without a safety guardrail, this crib will grow with your child as they transition into a toddler bed. The toddler bed stage is recommended once your child surpasses the height of 35 inches. Safety guardrail is sold separately. Daybed For added versatility, and as your child continues to grow, this crib converts into a daybed. Full-Sized Bed This crib will last well into adolescence as it converts into a full-size bed with headboard and footboard. Mattress and Graco Full-Size Crib Metal Bed Frame Conversion Kit are sold separately.

Graco Premium Foam Crib and Toddler Mattress Graco Premium Contoured Changing Pad Graco Full-Size Crib Conversion Kit - Metal Bed Frame Graco Toddler GuardRail Graco Benton 4 Drawer Chest Graco Benton 6 Drawer Dresser Type of Nursery Item Crib and Toddler Mattress Changing Pad Crib Conversion Kit Toddler Guardrail Drawer Dresser Drawer Dresser Assembled Dimensions (Inches) 52 x 27.6 x 5 32 x 16 x 3 75.5 x 12 19.5 x 12.5 x 1.5 17.72 x 31.89 x 40.87 17.75 x 47.25 x 32.63 Weight (Ib) 7 1.46 23 2.48 80 104.2 Brief Description The Graco Premium Foam Crib & Toddler Bed Mattress is the ideal recommended firmness for infants, and is designed to fit any standard full-size crib and toddler bed. The Graco Premium Contoured Changing Pad was designed to make changing your baby a clean, safe, and secure process. Our all-new baby changing pad is made of a water-resistant material, that is easy to wipe clean and keep your baby dry. Extend the life of your Graco crib into your not-so-little one’s childhood, teen years, and beyond. This kit will allow you to transform your Graco 4-in-1 or 5-in-1 convertible crib into a full-size bed. The Graco Toddler Guardrail is designed for safety above all, offering your child extra protection during the transition from the crib to the toddler bed. The Graco Benton 4 Drawer Dresser features an easy, new time-saving assembly process, and is accented by beautiful architectural beading detail at the top and bottom. The Graco Benton 6 Drawer Dresser features an easy, new time-saving assembly process, and is accented by beautiful architectural beading detail at the top and bottom.

Features a Space-Saving Storage Drawer The Graco Solano 4-in-1 Convertible Crib with Drawer combines classic looks with the added convenience of a space-saving storage drawer, allowing you to conveniently store and organize your most important nursery essentials.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Graco Solano Crib (Espresso): Style, Functionality, and Quality Rolled into One!
reviews.reviewText: The Graco Solano 4-in-1 Convertible Crib in espresso is a parent's dream! Assembly was a breeze, and its espresso finish adds a touch of sophistication to any nursery.The 4-in-1 design is a game-changer, evolving with your child from crib to full-size bed. Plus, the added drawer is a lifesaver for extra storage without compromising style.Sturdy, safe, and adjustable, it's a long-lasting investment. This crib is a perfect blend of style and functionality—a must-have for any nursery!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE this crib. It was easy to put together and very sturdy. After reading a lot of the reviews I almost did not purchase but found a lot of cribs had similar bad reviews. Very greatful the delivery men took care to drop off the crib and not drop it. Still getting things together but so far I love it. Will definitely update as needed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I had to purchase a new crib & this one looks great. The instructions, however, are pretty horrible. We’ve had to make adjustments to it already. Love the extra storage on the bottom! Look forward to using it for baby number two.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty crib, easy to put together, drawer is short though
reviews.reviewText: We purchased this crib because we were looking for something that was simple looking, reasonable, white, had good reviews and would maximize space (hence the drawer).Overall it was pretty easy to put together - helps to have two people working on it. Some of the steps had pictures that made it a bit difficult to follow - work slowly and keep double checking the picture for orientation of pieces. Once put together - we haven’t had any issues with the drawer not closing or things being lopsided (as some reviewers had said). It might have to do with making sure you follow the directions really well. I should point out - getting the mattress holder aligned in (the black metal piece) was really difficult - needed a long of strength and force.It’s very pretty looking...not sure how it will hold up (will edit this review once baby arrives and we use it). I’m hoping it’s durable!My only beef with this crib is that the drawer is shorter than I expected. It doesn’t go all the way to the back of the crib - so in no way do you get maximum use of the space under the crib - see pictures. This was terribly disappointing and upsetting, but not much I can do about it now.Some reviewers said they had issues getting close to the crib because of the drawer or that the drawer was hard to open. I haven’t had any of those issues. The drawer (although short) is easy to open with just my foot (you don’t even need to bend down). You don’t need a handle and my foot fits under the drawer enough that I could lean into the crib if I needed, and our crib is on carpet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality and durability is amazing!!
reviews.reviewText: Loved all the places to set stuff and the changing table design on top of the crib itself!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Despite reading the negative reviews, we are happy with this purchase!!
reviews.reviewText: My husband and I are expecting our first child in October, so we wanted to have a crib set up in advance. I found this crib, and despite the negative reviews I’ve seen, the Graco Solano 4-in-1 has met our expectations. My husband and I put this together in about an hour. The instructions are mostly pictures, but they are easy to follow if you pay attention. The crib did not have any damage like others mentioned. Just one minor scratch that is barely noticeable and not worth fixing. We don’t have an issue with the drawer on ours either, like some mentioned. Maybe it doesn’t glide in and out as smooth as other drawers I’ve used in my life? But if you line it up correctly when you are pushing it back in, I don’t really see why there would be an issue. We knew the drawer wouldn’t be huge, but to have a place to store extra sheets, it is perfect. The crib looks nice and felt sturdy when we tried shaking it after assembled. Overall, a good value for the price and we are happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They liked it
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a gift for my daughters friend who had a premy baby and they liked it. I am glad I could help them out at this time in their lives. I heard no complaints from her or my daughter, who is her friend, so I give 5 stars.
